text: Juan Pastor Marco (24 November 1951 - 11 August 2020) was a Spanish politician. He was born in Orba, Alicante. He was a member of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party (PSOE).Dictionary of Valencian politicians 1810-2006 by Jose Piqueras In 1977, he was elected to the Spanish Congress of Deputies representing Valencia Province.La Vanguardia, 17 June 1977, p18 He then was Secretary General of the PSOE in the Valencian Community from 1978 to 1979. He retired in 1982. Pastor Marco died on 11 August 2020, aged 68.Muere Joan Pastor, primer secretario general del PSPV ==References== Category:1951 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Spanish politicians
title: Juan Pastor Marco
